name: Tolerance
description: Hi guys!I made just the base of the game, the rest is up to YOU! I'd appreciate it if you would try it out!I would like YOU guys to help me build this game!I'm waiting for suggestions and feedback from you people so I can make the game better!Hopefully this project will...go places! Join our discord!https://discord.gg/QGfAzKV and share this game with your friends! Can't wait for suggestions
